subtitleNullable: Apple Leaf Disease Dataset from Plant Pathology Dataset
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is derived from the Kaggle Plant Pathology Challenge competition for the FGVC7 workshop at CVPR 2020 in Seattle, Washington State. There are 3 classes in this dataset,
1. scrab
2. rust
3. healthy

many disease classes in the parent dataset are not included in this dataset. For further information please check: https://arxiv.org/abs/2004.11958
title: Apple Leaf Disease Dataset
subtitle: Apple Leaf Disease Dataset from Plant Pathology Dataset
description:
This dataset is derived from the Kaggle Plant Pathology Challenge competition for the FGVC7 workshop at CVPR 2020 in Seattle, Washington State. There are 3 classes in this dataset,
1. scrab
2. rust
3. healthy

many disease classes in the parent dataset are not included in this dataset. For further information please check: https://arxiv.org/abs/2004.11958
